display_long_description:
ShapesXR is a powerful, collaborative design tool that allows you to prototype 3D products and XR applications within minutes (even AR apps for smart glasses 😎).

You can use the extensive library of 3D models, import your own 2D/3D assets or start from scratch using procedural primitives and brushes. No prior 3D experience required. 
ShapesXR also integrates seamlessly into your professional workflow allowing you to import and play your Figma interactive prototype and export your design directly into Unity thanks to a dedicated plug-in.

[media]

Bring your ideas to life by adding animations, interactive triggers and building a spatial presentation that unfolds in VR or MR.

[media]

Share your design with others. Invite them in VR or send a link to review and edit together in real-time, directly from the web.

[media]

ShapesXR is built from the ground up with professional teams in mind and offers advanced features for permission control, role management, and moderation tools, supporting secure collaboration and enterprise-level SOC2 Type 2 security.

You can use the extensive library of 3D models, import your own 2D/3D assets or start from scratch using procedural primitives and brushes. No prior 3D experience required. 
ShapesXR also integrates seamlessly into your professional workflow allowing you to import and play your Figma interactive prototype and export your design directly into Unity thanks to a dedicated plug-in.
